name: Charge (itch) (MoGamer09, M_DC, jumbshd)
description:
Johnnyboy's phone has no battery left. You need to help him plugging it into the outlet. But the cable has only a limited length, so you need to watch out for cable reels to get to the outlet. But be careful, don't cross the cable, it might shock you... only on crossing points you can cross your own cable without running in danger of dying.

Move Johnny with w a s d or with the arrow keys.

Made in 48 hours for the GMTK Jam 2021

Code: Mogamer09

Art: M_DC, Jumbshd

Music: Jumbshd

SFX: Mogamer09, jumbshd

Animations: Mogamer09

itch page: M_DC
